txt.en: 'Gl贸in sent you over to help? Whenever you find your way back to him thank him for that. There is much to do here.'
Gl贸in has sent several dwarves ahead to establish a small camp at the High Crag.
Larus and Vighar are at a small camp in the High Crag, east of Gl贸in's camp.\n\nGl贸in asked you to find his friends Larus and Vighar at the High Crag camp and aid them.

'There is much to do in the snowy hills to the north and east of us. A few of my friends, Larus and Vighar, have ventured to the east and set up a small camp in the High Crag. Seek them out and aid them however you can.'
